title: Clear
description: For brows that mean business. This clear, waterproof + flake-proof brow gel lifts, nourishes and sets brows for up to 24 hours. The weightless formula makes it easy to go from soft, fluffy brows to a sculpted, laminated look without feeling sticky or crunchy. It features a strong, flexible hold and goes on clear - that means zero white residue! The precision spoolie wand evenly coats and lifts each brow hair with the perfect amount of gel. Infused with Panthenol to strengthen + condition brows and Rosemary Extract to help support hair growth. Research Results: - 100% agree formula is easy to apply - 100% agree brows are locked in place without any stiffness - 100% agree formula does not feel sticky - 100% agree formula feels lightweight on brows - 100% agree formula is transparent on brows without any white residue Based on an immediate consumer study of 25 people.

title: Sweet Sips
description: Treat yourself or your bestie to our limited-edition holiday trio kit featuring all-new sparkly shades of this OG ColourPop fave – inspired by the sweetest sips! Our award-winning crème-to-powder formula delivers supercharged colour in just one swipe. Get high impact colour with this long-lasting shadow that has minimal creasing, fading or fallout.
